title: arknights / angelina
description:
Cover for artbook of arknights fan event in Japan xxxx. Created the illustration and design in 2023 via photoshop. Used wacom tablet intuos for roughs, sketch, coloring.
Angelina is a supporter operator working under Rhodes Island of the game Arknights.
